message: NOJIRA: protect invocations against NPEs and illegal sort ops (#120)
fixes tests and avoids NPE while showing plain attribuest wizard
[SYNCOPE-1233] Fixed NullPointerException in Topology when having a connector with no displayName
[SYNCOPE-1130] fix the issue by handling NPE + fix a further NPE issue aoccurring in case of missing information during user approval (case of test user)
Avoid an NPE if the SAML Response Issuer is null
NPE guards for both the RelayState and Response
[SYNCOPE-1121] solved NPE with empty sections while updating user
SYNCOPE-1174 - NPE in AccessTokenDataBinderImpl if no 'jwt.lifetime.minutes' schema is present
Enduser: prevent NPE when user is not logged in
Fixing (harmless but annoying) NPE when starting up Maven projects in embedded mode
